mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum, users_db.nickname, users_db.id, users_db.profile_img FROM (SELECT num, usercode, content, image, video, regdate, like_count, savefilename, filesize FROM post_db ORDER BY post_db.num DESC) result1 INNER JOIN users_db ON result1.usercode = users_db.usercode) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum, users_db.nickname, users_db.id, users_db.profile_img FROM (SELECT num, usercode, content, image, video, regdate, like_count, savefilename, filesize FROM post_db ORDER BY post_db.num DESC) result1 INNER JOIN users_db ON result1.usercode = users_db.usercode) WHERE usercode = #{usercode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_db (num, usercode, content, image, regdate, saveFileName, fileSize) VALUES(post_seq.NEXTVAL, #{usercode}, #{content}, #{image}, SYSDATE, #{saveFileName},#{fileSize})
